00020 class ValidatorCollection {
00021 
00022     const   TYPE_RE            = 're';
00023     const   TYPE_XSD           = 'xsd';
00024     const   TYPE_DTD           = 'dtd';
00025     const   TYPE_SIZE          = 'size';
00026     const   TYPE_CONTENT_TYPE  = 'content-type';
00027     const   TYPE_TIME          = 'time';
00028     const   TYPE_MD5           = 'md5';
00029     const   TYPE_PHP           = 'php'; // needed? i think not...
00030 
00031     private $aValidators;
00032     private $sBasePath;
00033     private $iValid;
00034 
00040     public function __construct($sBasePath = '') {
00041         $this->aValidators = array();
00042         $this->setBasePath($sBasePath);
00043     }
00044 
00050     public function setBasePath($sPath) {
00051         $this->sBasePath = $sPath;
00052     }
00053 
00061     public function addValidator($sValidator, $sType = ValidatorCollection::TYPE_RE) {
00062         switch ($sType) {
00063 
00064             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_RE:
00065                 $this->aValidators[] = new ValidatorRe($sValidator);
00066                 break;
00067 
00068             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_XSD:
00069                 $oValidator = new ValidatorXsd($sValidator);
00070                 $oValidator->setPath($this->sBasePath);
00071                 $this->aValidators[] = $oValidator;
00072                 break;
00073 
00074             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_SIZE:
00075                 $this->aValidators[] = new ValidatorSize($sValidator);
00076                 break;
00077 
00078             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_CONTENT_TYPE:
00079                 $this->aValidators[] = new ValidatorContentType($sValidator);
00080                 break;
00081 
00082             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_TIME:
00083                 $this->aValidators[] = new ValidatorTime($sValidator);
00084                 break;
00085 
00086             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_MD5:
00087                 $this->aValidators[] = new ValidatorMd5($sValidator);
00088                 break;
00089 
00090             case ValidatorCollection::TYPE_PHP:
00091                 break;
00092 
00093             default:
00094                 throw new UnknownValidatorTypeException('Validator type ' . $sType . ' is unknown.');
00095                 break;
00096 
00097         }
00098     }
00099 
00105     public function getValidators() {
00106         return $this->aValidators;
00107     }
00108 
00114     public function getValidatorCount() {
00115         return count($this->aValidators);
00116     }
00117 
00124     public function getValidCount() {
00125         return $this->iValid;
00126     }
00127 
00134     public function getFailCount() {
00135         return $this->getValidatorCount() - $this->getValidCount();
00136     }
00137 
00143     public function isValid() {
00144         return $this->getValidCount() == $this->getValidatorCount();
00145     }
00146 
00152     public function validateBatch(Response $oResponse) {
00153         $this->iValid = 0;
00154         foreach ($this->getValidators() as $oValidator) {
00155             if ($oValidator->run($oResponse)) {
00156                 $this->iValid++;
00157             }
00158         }
00159     }
00160 
00167     public function getValidationErrors() {
00168         $aErrors = array();
00169         foreach ($this->getValidators() as $oValidator) {
00170             $aErrors = array_merge($aErrors, $oValidator->getValidationErrors());
00171         }
00172         return $aErrors;
00173     }
00174 
00175 }
